yarangi.graphics.quadraturin.objects
Class SceneEntity

java.lang.Object
  yarangi.spatial.SpatialObjectSkeleton
      yarangi.graphics.quadraturin.objects.SceneEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISpatialObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
AggregateEntity, CircleLightEntity, CompositeSceneEntity, NewtonialSceneEntity, Overlay
public abstract class SceneEntity
extends SpatialObjectSkeleton

SceneEntity is a basic animate object in Scene. It provides means to render and animate itself, holds a life-cycle flag isAlive() and implements SpatialObjectSkeleton, so it can be registered in spatial index structures.
